engine = new groovy.text.SimpleTemplateEngine() filter = ['paxPluginVersion':"${version}"]
pomPath = 'archetype-resources/pom.xml'
pomFile = new File( "${basedir}/src/main/resources/${pomPath}" ) template = engine.createTemplate( pomFile ).make( filter ) new File( "${pom.build.outputDirectory}/${pomPath}" ).write( template.toString() )
